text: If Party A discovers that Party B has violated the Integrity Agreement attached hereto by bribing Party A's working personnel, Party A may elect to impose a penalty of RMB10,000 to 100,000, suspend cooperation for 1-3 years or terminate the cooperation depending on the seriousness of the violation and the consequences thus brought about, and any loss thus incurred to Party A shall be borne by Party B
label: No
